messages.message: I'm sorry, but what site do you know me from? I've been under attack from christians and trying to be careful. ..... I will be happy to add you when I verify your profile. .... again, I'm sorry...

Brian
I am sorry to hear that. I have nothing but kind things to say . Are they being mean about a post?
They are trying to contact my family and talk shit... they don't know who they are fucking with, so I'm trying to make it harder for them so they don't make it easy for me....lol

Brian
Wow that is messed up. How can I help?

It's all good now, 1 more attack and I'm gonna show up at the door! lol

Welcome aboard brother. It's a crazy ride but an honest one..
